title: Speech output for Albanian on the website "loecsen.com" > language course "Albanian". Words cannot be heard under Windows 11.
content:
Speech output for Albanian on the website "loecsen.com" > language course "Albanian". Words cannot be heard under Windows 11. What can I do? I downloaded the Albanian language pack, but the voice isn't there. Is this a Firefox or Windows problem?

Link: https://www.loecsen.com/de/lernen-albanisch

Greetings from Switzerland
creator: filip.honegger
